EmailTemplate.name: INVITE Year 7 Info Evening
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Explore Year 7 Information Evening, 28 May
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Starting high school can seem like a daunting change - but it doesn't have to be!
Come along to our Explore Year 7 Information Evening and hear from staff at St Andrew's talk about how to make a smooth transition to high school and from current students on the ins and outs of Year 7.
You will have the opportunity to tour our Middle School, try 'taster subjects' and see for yourself what makes our city school so special. You can also pick up your very own survival pack!
6.30pm, Wednesday 28 May
Heath Centre, Level 5
St Andrew's Cathedral School
St Andrew's House, Sydney Square
Bookings are essential: RSVP @ www.sacs.nsw.edu.au/tourselect/52 or call Alexandra Culas on 9286 9579.
In the meantime, you can find out what’s happening here at our St Andrew’s community by visiting our website, facebook page and our official youtube channel. They’re updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos
I look forward to welcoming you and your family to St Andrew's Cathedral School.
Kind regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9507 mobile 0418 255 923 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
You are receiving this invitation as you have previously indicated interest in Year 7 enrolment at St Andrew’s Cathedral School. We would love you to visit our city school however, if you would like to unsubscribe from further invitations, please click here.
